articles.author: Tom Beattie
articles.title: Brad Friedel slams Arsenal transfer decision and left perplexed by next choice of club - The Mirror
articles.description: The former Premier League mainstay has given his opinion on a player he previously coached but has seemingly been left confused by some of his recent career choices
articles.content:
Former Premier League stalwart Brad Friedel has questioned the wisdom behind Matt Turner's potential move from Arsenal to Nottingham Forest.
The ex-Liverpool and Tottenham stopper is in a position t… [+3008 chars]
